aboutme: I'm a versatile professional with experience across multiple industries, blending creativity, technical expertise, and analytical problem-solving. As a Multimedia Designer and 3D Rigging Artist, I've worked on game assets, animations, 3D printing, and motion design, bringing ideas to life through engaging visuals. My hands-on experience as a Print Press Operator has strengthened my attention to detail and quality control. Beyond creative work, I have a background in manual testing, ensuring software quality and functionality. My analytical side extends to tutoring, where I provided non-voice SQL database support, helping students understand complex database concepts. Additionally, my time as a Summer HR Intern gave me insights into organizational processes and team dynamics. This diverse skill set allows me to approach problems from multiple perspectivesâ€”whether in design, technology, or quality assurance. I thrive on learning and adapting to new challenges, always eager to expand my expertise and contribute to impactful projects.

Blender.description: Advanced level. Experienced in modeling, rigging, and UV unwrapping for game assets, animations, and 3D printing projects.

Adobe Substance Painter.description: Intermediate level. Skilled in texturing 3D models with detailed materials for realistic and stylized assets.

Unity.description: Intermediate level. Experience in importing assets, creating animations, and applying shaders for interactive content.

Marvelous Designer.description: Beginner level. Knowledgeable in designing and simulating realistic cloth and garment patterns.

Adobe Suite.description: Advanced level. Proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, and After Effects for graphic design, video editing, and motion graphics.

Da Vinci Resolve.description: Intermediate level. Capable of color correction, grading, and video editing for cinematic projects.

ZBrush.description: Beginner level. Familiar with sculpting techniques for refining 3D models and enhancing details.

HTML.description: Intermediate level. Used in building responsive web structures for portfolio and project pages.

Tailwind CSS.description: Intermediate level. Utilized for styling and creating clean, modern UI designs in web projects.

JavaScript.description: Intermediate level. Applied in building Core AI logic, interactive UI features, and dynamic content updates.

JSON.description: Intermediate level. Used to structure data for website content, Core AI logic, and dynamic rendering.

Node.JS.description: Beginner level. Familiar with setting up basic servers and backend logic for web applications.

C#.description: Beginner level. Used in Unity projects for scripting game logic and animations.

SQLite.description: Intermediate level. Used in database management for organizing structured data efficiently.

SQL.description: Intermediate level. Experience in database queries, data manipulation, and troubleshooting.
